title: IMultiJogLeader.GetArrowHeadAtIndex
description: Gets information for the specified arrow head.
remarks:
The return value is the following array of doubles :
[
arrowHeadPt
[3],
arrowHeadDir
[3],
arrowHeadWidth
,
arrowHeadHeight
,
arrowHeadStyle
]
where:
arrowHeadPt
[3] = XYZ arrow head tip location.
arrowHeadDir
[3] = XYZ arrow head direction.
arrowHeadWidth
= arrow head width where the width is measured along the arrow head direction.
arrowHeadHeight
= arrow head height.
arrowHeadStyle
= arrow head style; for example, open, closed, and so on. See
swArrowStyle_e
.
